publicationVenue.name: Conference on Innovative Data Systems Research

title: Automated Performance Management for the Big Data Stack
abstract: More than 10,000 enterprises worldwide today use the big data stack that is composed of multiple distributed systems. At Unravel, we have worked with a representative sample of these enterprises that covers most industry verticals. This sample also covers the spectrum of choices for deploying the big data stack across on-premises datacenters, private cloud deployments, public cloud deployments
venue: Conference on Innovative Data Systems Research
